page.title: 15EDUCATION
page.content: EDUCATION PROVISION IS CONTROLLED DIRECTLY BY WEST GLAMORGAN EDUCATION AUTHORITY WHICH IS BASED IN SWANSEA. WITHIN THE AREA THERE ARE 4 PRIMARY SCHOOLS:_ CATWG PRIMARY WITH 6 TEACHERS AND HEAD MISTRESS.THE CHURCH IN WALES PRIMARY WITH 6 TEACHERS AND A HEAD MASTER. BLAENHONDDAN PRIMARY SCHOOL WITH 8 TEACHERS AND A HEAD MASTER.WAUNCEIRCH PRIMARY SCHOOL WITH 7\ TEACHERS (1 PART TIME) AND A HEAD MISTRESS. THERE IS ALSO A NURSERY SCHOOL FOR 3/4 YEAR OLD CHILDREN AND A RESIDENTIAL SCHOOL FOR AUTISTIC CHILDREN IN THE LONGFORD AREA.AFTER LEAVING THE PRIMARY SCHOOLS AT 11 YEARS OF AGE THE CHILDREN PROCEED BY PARENTAL CHOICE TO EITHER OF THE DWR-Y-FELIN OR LLANGATWG 11-16 YEAR COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOLS.FROM HERE PUPILS MAY CONTINUE THEIR EDUCATION AT NEATH TERTIARY COLLEGE IN DWR-Y-FELIN ROAD.
